name: pnp-list-formatting-discussion-board-format
title: Discussion board format
shortDescription: This sample provides discussion board where title, description, tags and votes are available. Users can include emotions on discussions, comments and inline editing is available to update information.
longDescription: This sample provides discussion board where title, description, tags and votes are available. Users can include emotions on discussions, comments and inline editing is available to update information.

references.name: Use view formatting to customize SharePoint
references.description: You can use view formatting to customize how items in SharePoint lists and libraries are displayed. To do this, you construct a JSON object that describes the elements that are displayed when an item is loaded in a view and any styles to be applied to those elements.
